posts.raw_content:
I've seen true, heartfelt prayer requests from our people here... and I've seen us humbly pray to our God and our Lord.  I send a prayer up with every request I see.  I never thought that I would be asking for some though.

Some background: our daughter hasn't been eating or feeling the same during the past few months.  My wife said that middle school is tough for girls (and boys IIRC), but we haven't noticed anything besides the food intake and attitude change.  We keep a close eye on our kids, from what they watch to who they hang out with.  We try to be as involved as possible.  We must have missed this though, as it was a month or so until we started asking questions.  I'm hopeful that she can fight this disorder... I myself suffer from OCD.  I was diagnosed in my twenties, so I was older, but I remember how tough it was.

Regarding my job: I've been looking for a full-time job since way before my last contract expired on June 30th.  I had a bunch of interviews, but nothing worked.  Its a real, real strange job market... almost like employers don't want to take chances with anyone.  I eventually found employment, but within a week or two I realized the company was in it just for the money... profits over people all the time.  I started looking for my next position, but my employer took the next step first and amicably separated from me last Friday.  I wasn't too disappointed, as I couldn't stand working there and was very unsatisfied, but i wanted to wait until I found something else.

I mention the dishwasher only because, even with all the sadness and uncertainty we're dealing with, I still try and find positivity and humor in life.  So, yes, our dishwasher is leaking like a SOB and refuses to wash my dishes.... can you believe it?!  To add some more drama, our kitchen faucet also gave up last week.  However, we now have a wonderful bigger, nicer faucet, so there's that.

So, I humbly and prayerfully ask all y'all to pray for my daughter and my family.  May God Bless her with health and peace and happiness.  Please Lord, help me find a good job, where I can help people and lead others to Your path of Truth and Spirit.  And please guide us in purchasing a new dishwasher (its OK to laugh at that part).

May the Lord Bless and keep all those who are reading this.  Thank you for your time, your toughts, and your prayers.

Glory be to the Father, and to the Son, and to the Holy Spirit. 
As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be, world without end.  Amen.
posts.author: Nezock_theKnight
posts.title: Please pray for my family, magadonians... daughter is in hospital for anorexia, and its been really tough on the family.  I also lost my job.  And the dishwasher broke...
posts.content:
I've seen true, heartfelt prayer requests from our people here... and I've seen us humbly pray to our God and our Lord. I send a prayer up with every request I see. I never thought that I would be asking for some though.

Some background: our daughter hasn't been eating or feeling the same during the past few months. My wife said that middle school is tough for girls (and boys IIRC), but we haven't noticed anything besides the food intake and attitude change. We keep a close eye on our kids, from what they watch to who they hang out with. We try to be as involved as possible. We must have missed this though, as it was a month or so until we started asking questions. I'm hopeful that she can fight this disorder... I myself suffer from OCD. I was diagnosed in my twenties, so I was older, but I remember how tough it was.

Regarding my job: I've been looking for a full-time job since way before my last contract expired on June 30th. I had a bunch of interviews, but nothing worked. Its a real, real strange job market... almost like employers don't want to take chances with anyone. I eventually found employment, but within a week or two I realized the company was in it just for the money... profits over people all the time. I started looking for my next position, but my employer took the next step first and amicably separated from me last Friday. I wasn't too disappointed, as I couldn't stand working there and was very unsatisfied, but i wanted to wait until I found something else.

I mention the dishwasher only because, even with all the sadness and uncertainty we're dealing with, I still try and find positivity and humor in life. So, yes, our dishwasher is leaking like a SOB and refuses to wash my dishes.... can you believe it?! To add some more drama, our kitchen faucet also gave up last week. However, we now have a wonderful bigger, nicer faucet, so there's that.

So, I humbly and prayerfully ask all y'all to pray for my daughter and my family. May God Bless her with health and peace and happiness. Please Lord, help me find a good job, where I can help people and lead others to Your path of Truth and Spirit. And please guide us in purchasing a new dishwasher (its OK to laugh at that part).

May the Lord Bless and keep all those who are reading this. Thank you for your time, your toughts, and your prayers.

Glory be to the Father, and to the Son, and to the Holy Spirit. As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be, world without end. Amen.
